00045 void DispatchHandlerSynchronizer::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00046   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00047   m_receive_queue.push(event_ptr);
00048   m_cond.notify_one();
00049 }
00050 
00051 
00052 
00056 bool DispatchHandlerSynchronizer::wait_for_reply(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00057   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00058 
00059   while (m_receive_queue.empty())
00060     m_cond.wait(lock);
00061 
00062   event_ptr = m_receive_queue.front();
00063   m_receive_queue.pop();
00064 
00065   if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE
00066       && Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()) == Error::OK)
00067     return true;
00068 
00069   return false;
00070 }
